summary: The module implements a collection of utilities for assessing similarity between bibliographic records and performing automated merges of duplicate entries in the Open Library catalog. It provides functions to normalize and compare titles, authors, publication dates, ISBNs, page counts, and publishers, and defines higher‑level merge strategies (level‑1 and level‑2) that decide when two records can be combined.
business_intent: To enhance the quality and consistency of the Open Library database by automatically identifying and consolidating duplicate book records, reducing manual curation effort and improving search and discovery for users.
